text: aur unamen kuchh log aise hai jo tumhaaree or kaan lagaate hai, haalaanki hamane to unake dilon par parade daal rakhe hai ki ve use samajh na saken aur unake kaanon mein bojh daal diya hai. aur ve chaahe pratyek nishaanee dekh len tab bhee use maanenge nahin; yahaan tak ki jab ve tumhaare paas aakar tumase jhagadate hai, to avishvaas kee neeti apanaanevaale kahate hai, "yah to bas pahale ko logon kee gaathaen hai.
